title: ERROR_REPORT_CLAUDE_MISCONFIG
summary: Agent misconfiguration and troubleshooting edits caused deployment of stale assets and wasted developer time.
revert_command: git revert --no-edit f358ed1 2810863 d45dc16 247da38 6ed0281 b5bfe3e && git push
notes: Reverting is safe. The client UI source files remain intact.
